name: Murder in Neo New England
description:
Murder in Neo New England was made for the Idle Forums Wizard Jam, a 2-week game jam.

It's inspired by the episode title Cyberpunk Cop-Killer.

It's a Twine game, a murder-mystery set in a dystopian future. Can you figure out who the murderer is?

This is my first game making experience, Twine or otherwise, so it's light on gameplay.
